definition.text: This book will walk you through everything you need to know about the Docs.

translations.text: Dieses Buch führt Sie durch alles hindurch, was Sie über die Docs wissen müssen.
Эта книга проведет вас через все, что вам нужно знать о Документах.
Bu kitap, Dokümanlar hakkında bilmeniz gereken her şeyde size yol gösterecektir.

paragraphs.text: II->Foundations->Topic->Docs Basics->Read Chapter I to learn the basic concepts; the foundation that will help you understand the commands and styles explained later in the book.

III->Foundations->Topic->Docs Commands->The Docs include a powerful command line interface that allows you to quickly fire commands from the search box. Dive into Chapter II to learn the details of each command.
